nodes.text: Sergeant Jojames was a Advozse male who served as a member of the Balmorran resistance during the Cold War.

Stationed on Balmorra, he discovered that the Sith Empire planned on retaking the Balmorran Arms Factory and complete an unfinished access corridor that leads to the back of the factory. Jojames was able to obtain enough explosive ordnance to destroy the drill digging the corridor and send a Republic spacer to clear a path for his men.
